rO = rO + l5
000000001111_00000_000_00000_0010011

r3l = rO + l
000000000001_00000_000_00001_0010011

r4 = r3l + 3
000000000011_00001_000_00010_0010011

rl7 = r3l + 3;
111110000111_00010_000_00011_0010011

AND
rl = rO & r4
0000000_00100_00011_111_00100_0110011

OR
r3 = rO | rI7
